text:
Lyudmila Petrovna Senchina (; 13 December 1950, – 25 January 2018) was a Soviet, Ukrainian and Russian singer (soprano).
She was also an actress, appearing in "Armed and Dangerous" (), in which Lyudmila performed a female lead role.
Works.
Senchina was known for her songs "Cinderella" (), "Stones" (), "Love and Separation" (), "White Acacia" (), "Birthday" (), "White Dance" (), "Field Flowers" ()"."
Awards.
In 1979 she was awarded the title of Meritorious Artist of the RSFSR and in 2002 the title of People's Artist of Russia. Merited Artist of Ukraine (2003).
Senchina died on 25 January 2018 in a hospital in St. Petersburg of pancreatic cancer at the age of 67.
